Adi Saputra
Student (Universitas Negeri Malang)

A final-year undergraduate student majoring Physics at the State University of Malang ("Universitas Negeri Malang"), Indonesia. He is also affiliated with the Research Center for Quantum Physics Research, National Research and Innovation Agency (BRIN), where he has been actively involved in quantum computing and computational physics projects as a research intern.

He is an enthusiastic Linux user and regularly works with quantum computing tools such as Qiskit and PennyLane to deepen his understanding of quantum algorithms and quantum machine learning.

asptr00(at)gmail.com GitHub Twitter

Quantum Kernel Regression for Meteorological Forecasting

Adi Saputra

Internship Project Report 2025 Spotlight

Penelitian ini berfokus pada salah satu metode QML yang paling menonjol untuk aplikasi jangka pendek pada era Noisy Intermediate-Scale Quantum (NISQ), yaitu metode berbasis kernel kuantum.
